item.title: Work
item.description: Libraries MTN MOMO API Go Wrapper AFRICASTALKING API Go Wrapper Projects Javascript Website Scrapper Simple web utility to enable developers to scrape websites that load content using javascript Technologies: ReactJS, Python, FastAPI Chrome T-Rex Game for the Terminal A simple Go implementation of the offline Chrome jumping T-Rex game. Technologies: Go Space Impact Go (Nokia Game) This is a clone of the Space Impact mobile game series that was published by Nokia written in Go to be played in the terminal.
